title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 564.1 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 564.1 - Preamble

State Regulations
(a) A parking and
traffic commission has been established for the purpose of recommending to the
college president traffic and parking regulations to maintain an orderly
pattern of motor vehicle regulation and control. (b) The regulations so recommended by the
commission and established by the college apply to students, employees, visitors, contractors, employees of college affiliated organizations, and all
other persons whose vehicles are operated or parked on the grounds of the
college. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
564.1

Amended

New

York State Register May 8, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 19, eff. 5/8/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
